nodes.text: Bugnaught was a type of droid gladiator used by the Rattataki as training adversaries. One in particular fought in the Cauldron on Rattatak. This Bugnaught burned Carl to death with a flamethrower installed in his arm, but was ripped to pieces by Blorga.
Several other Bugnaughts belonged to Asajj Ventress, which she used as lightsaber fodder.
